data.name: Accuracy
data.description: Flurry, Wild Swing, and Onslaught wil now hit 12 targets rather than 9.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Gain a 660 unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Break Loose
data.description: Your mounting rage allows you to firm your Dwarven resolve and remove all roots and snares from you. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Breaking Point
data.description: Path Of the Giantslayer abilities will deal an additional X physical damage to targets beow 40% health.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to strength.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 7 seconds. If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Cleft In Twain
data.description: You attack your target with a devastating blow, dealing X physical damage. Your target will bleed out taking an additional Y over 5 seconds.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Deadly Determination
data.description: You deal an additional 300 damage, whenever you use an ability. This effect will fade after you damage 8 targets.

data.name: Deathblow
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
You unleash a powerful blow, dealing X physical damage.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Deep Wound
data.description: You slash at your enemy, dealing X physical damage and reducing the value of incoming healing on them by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Determination
data.description: If an exhaustive blow is defended, your abilities cost 0 action points for the next 6 seconds.

data.name: Devastate
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You devastate your target, dealing X physical damage and causing the target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to wounds for 10 seconds.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Distracting Roar
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds. During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Doom Seeker
data.description: You deal 1800 damage and knock down targets within 30 feet for 3 seconds.

data.name: Embrace the Pain
data.description: Each time you are hit by a ranged direct damage attack, you will deal X physical damage to enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Enervating Blow
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You deal an exhaustive blow that does X physical damage and reduces your target's chance to critically hit by 100% for 10 seconds.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Even the Odds
data.description: You gain a (1 * rank) unique bonus to toughness for each enemy within 20 feet, up to a maximum of 6 enemies. This effect will fade after 10 seconds.

data.name: Fierce Might
data.description: As you get closer to death and redemption, your rage fills you with power. Your critical bonus damage is increased by 10% for every 10% of hit points that you have lost.

data.name: Fierceness
data.description: Toggle: Hitting an enemy causes group member's within 100 feet will gain a X ability bonus to weapon skill, and you will take a X ability penalty to initiative for 6 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to three times.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flurry
data.description: You wildly swing in front of you, dealing between X physical damage and Y physical damage.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their action points into yourself, and causing them to take a 160 morale penalty to strength for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Got No Time For You
data.description: All attacks will generate 25% less hate.

data.name: Grievous Harm
data.description: You deal 1800 damage and debuff the target's outgoing damage to 75% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Gudrun's Warcry
data.description: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Your group's abilities cost 25% fewer action points for 20 seconds while within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Hastened Punishment
data.description: Cooldowns on your exhaustive attacks are reduced by 25%.

data.name: Honor Restored
data.description: All your exhaustive attacks have a 100% chance to heal you for X health.

data.name: Incapacitate
data.description: You render an incapacitating blow to your target, dealing X physical damage and knocking them down for 3 seconds. This attack is undefendable.

data.name: Inevitable Doom
data.description:
You deal X physical damage to your target and force them to share your doomed fate, inflicting a dark rune on them. The rune will explode every 2 seconds and will keep exploding for 8 seconds, dealing Y physical damage to all enemies within 30 feet of them.

Retribution has a 100% chance to proc from this ability's effect.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Looks Like a Challenge
data.description: You deal 1200 damage to targets within 30 feet and debuff incoming healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: No Escape
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Dual Wield
data.description:
A crippling blow, dealing X physical damage to all enemies within 30 feet. The victims will all become snared, reducing their run speed anywhere from 10% and 40% for 5 seconds.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Onslaught
data.description: You swipe at the enemies in front of you, dealing X physical damage over 10 seconds to enemies within 40 feet.

data.name: Power Through
data.description: Exhaustive blows will no longer remove your Rage.

data.name: Precarious Assault
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
A reckless attack which deals X physical damage to your target, but leaves you off-balance. For the next 10 seconds, your chance to be critically hit is increased by 1%. This negative effect stacks up to 10 times.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Pulverizing Strike
data.description: A furious slash that deals X physical damage and causes your target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to toughness for 9 seconds.

data.name: Push For More
data.description: Your autoattack speed is increased by 25% while you are furious and 50% while you are berserk.

data.name: Rampage
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description: Deals X physical damage. For the next 10 seconds, you gain 20% parry strikethrough and you gain a unique bonus to wounds equal to 300% of your bonus from items. You will not gain health equal to the wounds increased.

data.name: Reckless Gamble
data.description: While this ability is active, your melee attacks will deal an additional X physical damage , but you will also suffer X/2 physical damage each time.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 action points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Relentless Strike
data.description: You strike at your opponent, immediately inflicting X physical damage. The wound continues to bleed for Y physical damage for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Retribution
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, all of your Path of the Skavenslayer abilities have a 25% chance to deal additional X physical damage.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Rune of Absorption
data.description: A merciless attack that deals X physical damage. Over the next 10 seconds, you will gain 15 action points and 15 rage every second.

data.name: Runic Blessings
data.description: Upon falling in battle, you will immediately get back in the fight at 50% health, 100% rage and unleashing a blow to all enemies within 40 feet and dealing X physical damage. This effect can only happen once every minute.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shatter Limbs
data.description: You brutally crush all enemies within 30 feet, dealing x physical damage. Your merciless display of savagery intimidates your enemy, increasing their cooldown timers by 1 second for every enemy you struck, to a maximum of 5 seconds. This effect lasts for 10 seconds.

data.name: Short Temper
data.description: While you are in the berserk state, all of your cooldowns are reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Slaughter
data.description: Your action point costs are reduced by 5 points while furious and 10 points while berserk.

data.name: Slow Down
data.description: You deal X physical damage and reduce the movement speed of your enemy by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Spellbreaker
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
A shattering strike which deals X physical damage to the target. If the target has any blessings or enchantments, this attack will then dispel up to 3 of them, dealing Y physical damage for each one.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Spine Crusher
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: You deal X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from stuns and knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to corporeal resistance.

data.name: Takin' Chances
data.description: While you are furious, you regain X health every 4 seconds. While you are berserk, you regain Y health every 4 seconds.

data.name: The Bigger They Are...
data.description: Whenever you deal critical damage, you will gain 15% chance to critically hit for 6 seconds. Each time you trigger this, you will gain a stack of Precarious Assault.

data.name: Throw Axe
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage.

data.name: Unleashed Power
data.description: You unleash a wave of power, causing groupmates' attacks to deal an additional 300 damage for 10 seconds while within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Untouchable
data.description: Your chance to defend attacks is increased by 100% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Violent Impacts
data.description: Every 4 seconds, you will gain one stack of an effect which reduces the Rage cost of your exhaustive blows by 25%. This effect stacks up to 3 times, and using an exhaustive blow will consume on stack.

data.name: Wild Gambit
data.description: Gain a 120 unique bonus to strength and weapon skill, but take a 120 unique penalty to toughness.

data.name: Wild Swing
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You wildly attack everything around you, each enemy that you hit within 30 feet suffers anywhere from X physical damage to Y physical damage.

If you are furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.
